committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To transfer certain lands placed within the Cape Hatteras National Seashore because of an erroneous survey to those individuals claiming the lands.

summary.text: Removes certain lands from the Cape Hatteras National Seashore and transfers them to specified individuals claiming ownership.

titles.title: To transfer certain lands placed within the Cape Hatteras National Seashore because of an erroneous survey to those individuals claiming the lands.
